abstract.para:
This documents the installation of the Pathagar book server with in a virtual environment (virtualenv) on to a Raspberry Pi, possibly already running
Rachel
What's described at the worldpossible site is their current version which requires a 64 gigabyte sd card. Their original version fit onto a 32 gigabyte sd card. Our use case is for the XO laptop clients which can not read mp4 video files so these had to be converted to webm format which takes up more space necessitating a 64 gigabyte card. Conversion of the current version would exceed the capacity of a 64 gigabyte card; 128 gigabyte cards, although they do now exist, do not function inside the Raspberry Pi.
. It includes setting up the Raspberry Pi as it comes out of the box .
